entry.title: IoT with python and Raspberry Pi
entry.summary:
Description

IoT with python and Raspberry Pi by Sandeep Nagar at PyDelhiConf on 05th Mar 2016. Slides and content available at https://github.com/yoddha24/IoT-Rpi_Python.

Visit https://pydelhi.org/talks for more.

entry.title: Multiple Talks 2016-06-31
entry.summary:
Description

Python byte elongating battery life by Ashutosh Kumar Singh , Nupur Agrahari https://cfp.pydelhi.org/pydelhi-conference-2016/proposals/python-byte-elongating-battery-life/

Functional Testing of Mobile Applications using Appium and Python by @chi6rag more details at https://cfp.pydelhi.org/pydelhi-conference-2016/proposals/functional-testing-of-mobile-applications-using-appium-and-python/

IOT and Raspberry pi by Sandeep Nagar https://cfp.pydelhi.org/pydelhi-conference-2016/proposals/iot-with-python-and-raspberry-pi/

Visit https://pydelhi.org/talks for more.
